agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF FORMAL MEETING COMMITTEE: Appropriations - S/C on Article II TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Wednesday, February 27, 2019 PLACE: JHR 131 CHAIR: Rep. Sarah Davis The Appropriations Subcommittee on Article II will meet in a formal meeting to discuss House budget items related to Article II. The Subcommittee will be working on the Department of State Health Services and the Department of Family and Protective Services. The Subcommittee may work on any unfinished business related to other Article II agencies. As a reminder no public or agency testimony may be taken during a formal meeting.
